channel.title: How to make it wearable in the right place?

Ect.
anyways how?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2010, 07:50:31 pm[/size][hr]Reaspond PLOX I NEED HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 14, 2010, 08:07:27 pm[/size][hr]BUMP CAUSE U GUYS WONT HELP ME!@$@#

item.title: How to make it wearable in the right place?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Yes there is a way. Look in your server files and open up item.java you should see stuff like

public static int body[] = {577,2896,2906,2916,2926,2936,2520, 638 , 640,642, 430, 10300, 11154, 11471, 10625, 10628, 10930, 10933, 10935, 10937, 10939, 10941, 10927, 11998, 11997, 11281, 10222, 11268, 10408, 11977, 11975, 11198, 11199, 11200, 11173, 11175, 11177, 11179

All those numbers are item IDs separated by a comma. Find the right spot and put your item ID in there.

You also might have noticed this

	public static int amulets[] = {4035
	public static int arrows[] = { 11774
	public static int boots[] = {3393

Thatâ€™s the item slot the IDs will go in. If you made a new item like Lava Boots you would put the ID after public static int boots[] = {

For your Dragon Plate body you would put that in the public static int platebody[] = { area.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make it wearable in the right place?
